input_text:
Job Title: Roofing Project Manager

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
If you're an experience residential or commercial roofer to 8+ years experience, please read on!

My client is a family owned roofing company with 30+ years in the industry focusing on Commercial and Multi-Family in the DFW metro area and throughout Texas and Oklahoma.

With over 60 Million Square Feet of roofing installed in the past 10 years in across commercial, residential, industrial, military, educational, healthcare, retail, solar exteriors, multi-family, senior living, and hospitality.

You'll provide reputable services including new and replacement roofing - standing seam, concrete tiles, all types of shingles, and stone coated steel slates. Specialties include built-up, modified bitumen, coatings, TPO, and single ply.

Requirements

8+ years Experience managing roofing field workersKnowledge of common commercial roofing systems and productsProficient in computer/mobile-based project reporting softwareInternal/External communication skills

Benefits

Salary Range $70K to $95K401(k) matchingDental insuranceHealth insuranceLife insurancePaid time off

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Scott.Black@CyberCoders.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : SB19-1796188 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Scott Black - Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CyberCoders will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CyberCoders is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Proficient in computer/mobile-based project reporting software
